section.name: Wayback Memento interface
section.p:
This manual is for versions 1.6 and 1.7 of wayback. Download wayback.war from Internet Archive Follow installation guide . To configure memento interface uncomment memento bean. Below is example of installation of wayback as ROOT under tomcat.
<import resource="MementoReplay.xml"/> <bean name="8080:memento" parent="8080:wayback"> <property name="replayPrefix" value="http://lanlproto.santafe.edu:8080/memento/" /> <property name="queryPrefix" value="http://lanlproto.santafe.edu:8080/list/" /> <property name="configs"> <props> <prop key="aggregationPrefix">http://lanlproto.santafe.edu:8080/list/</prop> </props> </property>
<property name="replay" ref="mementoreplay" /> <property name="query"> <bean class="org.archive.wayback.query.Renderer"> <property name="captureJsp" value="/WEB-INF/query/Memento.jsp" /> </bean> </property>
<property name="uriConverter"> <bean class="org.archive.wayback.archivalurl.ArchivalUrlResultURIConverter"> <property name="replayURIPrefix" value="http://lanlproto.santafe.edu:8080/memento/"/> </bean> </property> <property name="parser"> <bean class="org.archive.wayback.memento.MementoRequestParser"> <property name="maxRecords" value="10000" /> <property name="earliestTimestamp" value="1996" /> </bean> </property> <property name="exception"> <bean class="org.archive.wayback.exception.BaseExceptionRenderer"> <property name="errorJsp" value="/WEB-INF/exception/TimegateError.jsp" /> </bean> </property> </bean>
this bean will add following services to the wayback:
Timegate
http://lanlproto.santafe.edu:8080/memento/timegate/{url}
Memento
http://lanlproto.santafe.edu:8080/memento/20120328164435/{url}
